modify: path:        path of the JSON to be updated.
subsystem:   subsystem for which API behavior needs to be modified.
api:         api for which a particular attribute has to be updated.

cardInfo: isNtnProfileActive: valid isNtnProfileActive are 0 - not active and 1 - active only.
simRefresh: fileId:    Elementary file id in SIM.
aid:       AID (Application Identifier) applicable for NONPROVISIONING session type.

memoryfull: storageType:  valid storage types are NONE , SIM

xtra_status: validity         Number of hours that xtra assistance data will remain valid
dataStatus       Valid status correspond to enum values of telux::loc::XtraDataStatus, eg: 1,2,3.
constellation_update: mask             A mask to enable different signals. Refer to telux::loc::GnssSignalType for the signals that can be enabled. An example of a valid mask is 0x1FFFFF.

capabilities_update: action: valid values - add/remove. Event to be used to add or remove capabilities that are indicated via @refILocationListener::onCapabilitiesInfo
mask: Integer mask for different capabilities. Refer to telux::loc::LocCapabilityType for the capabilities that can be added/removed.
sysinfo_update_current: current: Current leap seconds, in unit of seconds
sysinfo_update_leapsecond: system_week:                    Extended week number at reference tick
system_msec:                    Time into the current week at reference tick
leap_seconds_before_change:     Number of leap seconds prior to the leap second change event
leap_seconds_after_change:      Number of leap seconds after the leap second change event
disaster_crisis_report: path:                    path to the json file containing disaster and crisis report, for example: system-info/loc/ILocationManager.json

sanity_update: sanityState: true if in good state, otherwise false

sensor_event: featureName       string, Valid features are available from JSON configuration.
eventId           Integer, valid event Id are available from csv data file

selfTestFailed: sensorMask         Integer mask to represent self test failure for multiple sensors.

ssr: serviceStatus:  valid service status are SERVICE_AVAILABLE, SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE & SERVICE_FAILED.

incomingCall: rttMode:          valid rttMode are 0 - DISABLED and 1 - FULL only

signalStrengthUpdate: slotId:           integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
Note: Signal Strength is separated by comma and each RAT signal info is represented as below
rat:     string, RAT type. RAT for retrieving Signal Strength information. valid values are GSM, LTE, WCDMA, NR5G, NB1_NTN.
In case of RAT is GSM,   integer, p1->gsmSignalStrength, p2->gsmBitErrorRate.
In case of RAT is LTE,   integer, p1->lteSignalStrength, p2->lteRsrp, p3->lteRsrq, p4->lteRssnr, p5->lteCqi, p6->timingAdvance.
In case of RAT is WCDMA, integer, p1->signalstrength, p2-> bitErrorRate, p3->ecio, p4->rscp.
In case of RAT is NR5G,  integer, p1->rsrp, p2->rsrq, p3->rssnr.
In case of RAT is NB1_NTN,  integer, p1->signalStrength, p2->rsrp, p3->rsrq, p4->rssnr.
cellInfoListUpdate: slotId:       integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
Note: Cell info list is separated by comma and each RAT cell info is represented as below
cellType:     integer, Cell type. Valid cellTypes are GSM-1, LTE-3, WCDMA-4, NR5G-6, NB1_NTN-7 (CDMA and TDSCDMA not supported)
isRegistered: integer, Registered cell or not, Valid values are 1 or 0
voiceServiceStateUpdate: slotId:                   integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
voiceServiceState:        integer, Voice service state. Refer SDK documentation enum VoiceServiceState. For example REG_HOME = 1 and REG_DENIED = 3
voiceServiceDenialCause:  integer, Voice service denial failure cause. Refer SDK documentation enum VoiceServiceDenialCause. For example NETWORK_FAILURE = 17
radioTech:                integer, Radio technology for Voice service state. Refer SDK documentation enum RadioTechnology. For example RADIO_TECH_LTE = 14
operatingModeUpdate: operatingMode:   integer, valid 0-ONLINE, 1-AIRPLANE MODE, 2-FACTORY TEST, 3-OFFLINE, 4-RESETTING, 5-SHUTTING DOWN, 6-PERSISTENT LOW POWER.
eCallOperatingModeUpdate: slotId:            integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
operatorInfoUpdate: slotId:            integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
longName:          string, Valid operator long name
shortName:         string, Valid operator short name.
isHome:            bool, Valid value is 1 or 0 signifies PLMN is in home network or not.

systemSelectionPreferenceUpdate: slotId:        integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
serviceDomainPreference: integer, valid serviceDomainPreference are UNKNOWN = -1, CS_ONLY = 0, PS_ONLY = 1, CS_PS = 2 Refer for more details telux::tel::ServiceDomainPreference

ratPreferences: integer, valid ratPreference are 0 - PREF_CDMA_1X , 1 - PREF_CDMA_EVDO, 2 - PREF_GSM, 3 - PREF_WCDMA, 4 - PREF_LTE, 5 -PREF_TDSCDMA, 6 - PREF_NR5G, 7 - PREF_NB1_NTN, 8 - PREF_NR5G_NSA, 9 - PREF_NR5G_SA  Refer for more details telux::tel::RatPrefType
gsmBands: integer, gsm bands preference. Refer for more details telux::tel::GsmRFBand
wcdmaBands: integer, wcdma Bands preference. Refer for more details telux::tel::WcdmaRFBand
lteBands: integer, lte bands preference. Refer for more details telux::tel::LteRFBand
nsaBands: integer, nsa bands preference. Refer for more details telux::tel::NrRFBand
saBands: integer, sa bands preference. Refer for more details telux::tel::NrRFBand
systemInfoUpdate: slotId:            integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
currentServingRat: integer, valid currentServingRat Refer for more details telux::tel::RadioTechnology
currentServingDomain: integer, valid currentServingDomain Refer for more details telux::tel::ServiceDomain
currentRegistrationState: integer, valid currentRegistrationState Refer for more details telux::tel::ServiceRegistrationState
endcAvailability:  integer, valid UNKNOWN = -1, AVAILABLE = 0, UNAVAILABLE = 1 Refer for more details telux::tel::endcAvailability
dcnrRestriction:   integer, valid UNKNOWN = -1, RESTRICTED = 0, UNRESTRICTED = 1 Refer for more details telux::tel::dcnrRestriction
smsRat:  integer, valid smsRat refer for more details telux::tel::RadioTechnology
smsDomain:   integer, valid UNKNOWN = -1, NO_SMS = 0, SMS_ON_IMS = 1, SMS_ON_3GPP = 2. Refer for more details telux::tel::SmsDomain
ntnSmsStatus: integer, valid UNKNOWN = -1, NOT_AVAILABLE = 0, TEMP_FAILURE = 1, AVAILABLE = 2. Refer for more details telux::tel::NtnSmsStatus
lteCapability:   integer, refer for more details telux::tel::LteCsCapability
CallAllowedRat_i:  integer, Current cell radio technology. Refer SDK documentation enum RadioTechnology. For example RADIO_TECH_LTE = 14
CallAllowedDomain_i:  integer, Current cell service domain registered on system. Valid value is telux::tel::ServiceDomain::CS_ONLY = 1 or telux::tel::ServiceDomain::PS_ONLY = 2
CallAllowedType_i:  integer, Current call allowed type in cell. Refer SDK documentation enum CallsAllowedInCell. For example ALL_CALLS = 3
networkTimeUpdate: slotId:    integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
year:      integer, valid year Refer for more details telux::tel::NetworkTimeInfo
month:     integer, valid month Refer for more details telux::tel::NetworkTimeInfo
day:       integer, valid day Refer for more details telux::tel::NetworkTimeInfo
hour:      integer, valid hour Refer for more details telux::tel::NetworkTimeInfo
minute:    integer, valid minute Refer for more details telux::tel::NetworkTimeInfo
second:    integer, valid second Refer for more details telux::tel::NetworkTimeInfo
dayOfWeek: integer, valid dayOfWeek Refer for more details telux::tel::NetworkTimeInfo
timeZone:  integer, valid timeZone Refer for more details telux::tel::NetworkTimeInfo
dstAdj:    integer, valid dstAdj Refer for more details telux::tel::NetworkTimeInfo
nitzTime:  string, valid nitzTime Refer for more details telux::tel::NetworkTimeInfo
rFBandInfoUpdate: slotId:    integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
band:      integer, valid band Refer for more details telux::tel::RFBand
channel:   integer, valid channel Refer for more details telux::tel::RFBandInfo
bandWidth: integer, valid bandWidth Refer for more details telux::tel::RFBandWidth
networkRejectionUpdate: slotId:                integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
rejectSrvInfoRat :    integer, valid servingSystemInfo Refer for more details telux::tel::ServingSystemInfo
rejectSrvInfoDomain : integer, valid servingSystemInfo Refer for more details telux::tel::ServingSystemInfo
rejectCause :          integer, valid rejectCause Refer for more details telux::tel::NetworkRejectInfo
mcc :                  string, valid mcc Refer for more details telux::tel::NetworkRejectInfo
mnc :                  string, valid mnc Refer for more details telux::tel::NetworkRejectInfo

ssr: serviceStatus:  valid service status are SERVICE_AVAILABLE, SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE & SERVICE_FAILED.

machine_availability: availability: valid values - UNAVAILABLE/AVAILABLE. Event to notify client via @ref ITcuActivityListener::onMachineUpdate, if the machine is available or not

imsServiceConfigsUpdate: slotId:                integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
imsServiceEnabled:     integer, default value is 0, valid imsServiceEnabled Refer for more details telux::tel::ImsServiceConfig
voImsEnabled:          integer, default value is 0, valid voImsEnabled Refer for more details telux::tel::ImsServiceConfig
smsEnabled:            integer, default value is 0, valid smsEnabled Refer for more details telux::tel::ImsServiceConfig
rttEnabled:            integer, default value is 0, valid rttEnabled Refer for more details telux::tel::ImsServiceConfig
imsSipUserAgentUpdate: slotId:                integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
sipUserAgent:          string, valid sip user agent

selectionModeUpdate: slotId:            integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
mcc :              string, valid mcc Refer for more details telux::tel::NetworkModeInfo.
mnc :              string, valid mnc Refer for more details telux::tel::NetworkModeInfo.
networkScanResultsUpdate: slotId:           integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
mcc :             string, valid mcc Refer for more details telux::tel::OperatorInfo.
mnc :             string, valid mnc Refer for more details telux::tel::OperatorInfo.
rat:              integer, Radio technology for Voice service state. Refer SDK documentation enum RadioTechnology. For example RADIO_TECH_LTE = 14

regStatusUpdate: slotId:            integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
rat:               integer, Radio technology for Voice service state. Refer SDK documentation enum RadioTechnology. For example RADIO_TECH_LTE = 14
errorCode:         integer, only valid when the IMS in NOT_REGISTERED status. More details refer to SIP-RFC3261 section 13.2.2.2 and section 13.2.2.3.
errorString:       string, only valid when the IMS in NOT_REGISTERED status. More details refer to SIP-RFC3261 section 13.2.2.2 and section 13.2.2.3.
serviceInfoUpdate: slotId:            integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
pdpStatusInfoUpdate: slotId:               integer, valid slotIds are 1 & 2 only.
isConnected:          bool, valid value is 1 or 0 signifies PDP is connected or not
pdpFailure:           integer, PDP failure error code. Refer for more details telux::tel::PdpFailureCode.
dataCallEndReason:    integer, PDP call end reason type. Refer for more details telux::common::EndReasonType.
apnName:              string, IMS registration APN name. Refer for more details telux::tel::ImsPdpStatusInfo.

recommendationChange: recommendation:  string, ALLOWED :dual data is allowed, NOT_ALLOWED :dual data is not allowed, NOT_RECOMMENDED :dual data is not recommended

status: rxStatus: string, cv2x rx status, either 1 of valid strings: inactive, active or suspended
txStatus: string,  cv2x tx status, either 1 of valid strings: inactive, active or suspended
rxCause:  integer, rxStatus inactive/suspended reason, not required if rxStatus is active
txCause:  integer, txStatus inactive/suspended reason, not required if txStatus is active
slss_rx_info: slssid:     integer, equal or more than 0
rsrp:       integer,  end user reponsiblity make sure valid value input

sps_schedule_change: spsid:       integer, sps id, end user reponsiblity input legal value
utctime:     integer64, new specduling utc time
periodicity: integer,  periodicity, end user reponsiblity input legal value
capabilities: minFreqPool0:         integer, minimum EARFCN of pool 0, end user reponsiblity input legal value
maxFreqPool0:         integer, maxmum  EARFCN of pool 0, end user reponsiblity input legal value
optionalMinFreqPool1: integer, optional, Minimum EARFCN of pool 1, end user reponsiblity input legal value
optionalMaxFreqPool1: integer, optional, Maxmum  EARFCN of pool 1, end user reponsiblity input legal value
